page.title: 11RECREATION
page.content: From our survey we found that only half the people in the residential estate own a car,but most can drive.Most people own a bicycle.Many people use the bus but only 1 owns a bus pass. Most people like their immediate environment but could improve it by having less litter and more trees. Half the people use the facilities at Thornaby Pavilion,but very rarely. Many people belong to the library.Reading,watching television and knitting are the most popular pastimes.Romantic novels are the most widely read.The favourite type of television programme is soap opera followed by comedy.Most people have one or more televisons and half have a video.Most people don't play or own a musical instrument or belong to a musical group.The favourite musical instrument is the piano.
